snippet: Charl Schwartzel increased his lead to four strokes at the Thailand Golf Championship in Chon Buri with a second straight seven-under 65.
abstract: Charl Schwartzel increases his lead to four strokes at Thailand Golf Championship in Chon Buri; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Charl Schwartzel increased his lead to four strokes at the Thailand Golf Championship in Chon Buri with a second straight seven-under 65.
